original_title: A Skinnamarink Afternoon with Sharon, Lois and Bram
overview: Celebrate the 45th anniversary of the beloved musical trio with films old and new, as well as a live musical performance. Take a trip down memory lane with a rare screening of their 1979 TV Special, Sharon, Lois & Bram Downtown, filmed in Kensington Market. Then, be the first to get a sneak peek at their upcoming broadcast special filmed at Torontoâ€™s iconic Winter Garden Theatre. And best of all, join Sharon, Bram, Elephant and friends in singing a few of their old favourites. (Downtown provided courtesy of the CBC.)
title: A Skinnamarink Afternoon with Sharon, Lois and Bram
